articles.title: OpenAI co-founds Agentic AI Foundation, donates AGENTS.md
articles.summary: OpenAI has co-founded the Agentic AI Foundation, a new organization focused on developing and promoting autonomous AI systems. As part of this effort, OpenAI has donated its AGENTS.md framework, which provides a foundation for building AI models that can act independently. This move aims to accelerate the development of more advanced and autonomous AI capabilities.

articles.title: Launching our first OpenAI Certifications courses
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced its first certification courses, aiming to educate developers and professionals on effectively utilizing AI technologies. These courses will provide hands-on training and validation of skills in AI development, deployment, and management. By launching these certifications, OpenAI seeks to establish a standard for AI expertise and foster a community of skilled professionals.

articles.title: OpenAI appoints Denise Dresser as Chief Revenue Officer
articles.summary: OpenAI has appointed Denise Dresser as its new Chief Revenue Officer, marking a significant move to drive business growth and revenue strategies. This appointment is expected to leverage Dresser's expertise in scaling companies and navigating complex market landscapes. As CRO, Dresser will play a key role in shaping OpenAI's commercial vision and expansion.

articles.title: Bringing powerful AI to millions across Europe with Deutsche Telekom
articles.summary: Deutsche Telekom is partnering to bring powerful AI capabilities to millions of users across Europe, enhancing customer experiences and driving innovation. This collaboration aims to make AI more accessible and user-friendly, bridging the technology gap for a wider audience. By leveraging AI, Deutsche Telekom is poised to revolutionize various aspects of daily life, from communication to entertainment.

articles.title: Instacart and OpenAI partner on AI shopping experiences
articles.summary: Instacart has partnered with OpenAI to integrate artificial intelligence into its grocery shopping platform, aiming to create more personalized and efficient shopping experiences. This collaboration will leverage OpenAI's technology to enhance Instacart's features, such as automated shopping lists and tailored product recommendations. The partnership is set to revolutionize the online grocery shopping landscape with AI-driven innovations.

articles.title: Engineering more resilient crops for a warming climate
articles.summary: Scientists are developing more resilient crops to withstand the challenges of a warming climate, using advanced engineering techniques to enhance their ability to thrive in extreme temperatures and weather conditions. This innovation aims to improve global food security by creating crops that can adapt to rising temperatures and changing precipitation patterns. By doing so, researchers hope to mitigate the impacts of climate change on agriculture and ensure a more sustainable food supply.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI model developed by DeepMind, has made significant strides in protein structure prediction over the past five years, transforming the field of biology and medicine. Its impact has enabled breakthroughs in disease research, drug discovery, and our understanding of the human body. By accurately predicting protein shapes, AlphaFold has opened up new avenues for scientific research and potential medical applications.

articles.title: Revealing a key protein behind heart disease
articles.summary: Researchers have identified a key protein that plays a crucial role in the development of heart disease, paving the way for potential new treatments. This breakthrough discovery could lead to more effective therapies and improved outcomes for patients with cardiovascular conditions. By understanding the protein's function, scientists can now explore innovative ways to target and mitigate its effects on the heart.

articles.title: How we’re bringing AI image verification to the Gemini app
articles.summary: Gemini is integrating AI-powered image verification into its app to enhance security and authenticity. This innovative feature uses artificial intelligence to verify the legitimacy of images, protecting users from potential scams and fraudulent activities. By leveraging AI, Gemini aims to provide a safer and more trustworthy experience for its users.

articles.title: Build with Nano Banana Pro, our Gemini 3 Pro Image model
articles.summary: Introducing the Nano Banana Pro, a cutting-edge image model based on the Gemini 3 Pro architecture, designed to empower developers to build innovative applications. This model enables the creation of highly realistic images, opening up new possibilities for AI-generated content. With Nano Banana Pro, developers can unlock new levels of creativity and productivity in their projects.

articles.title: Introducing swift-huggingface: The Complete Swift Client for Hugging Face
articles.summary: The Hugging Face team has introduced swift-huggingface, a comprehensive Swift client that enables seamless integration of Hugging Face's AI models into iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS apps. This new client allows developers to easily incorporate natural language processing, computer vision, and other AI capabilities into their Apple ecosystem projects. By doing so, it opens up new possibilities for AI-driven app development on Apple devices.

articles.title: DeepMath: A lightweight math reasoning Agent with smolagents
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced DeepMath, a novel math reasoning agent that utilizes smolagents to provide lightweight and efficient mathematical problem-solving capabilities. This innovative approach enables DeepMath to tackle complex math problems with improved accuracy and speed. By leveraging smolagents, DeepMath has the potential to revolutionize math education and research with its enhanced reasoning abilities.

articles.title: We Got Claude to Fine-Tune an Open Source LLM
articles.summary: Researchers successfully fine-tuned Claude, an AI model, on an open-source large language model (LLM), demonstrating the potential for customized and adaptable language models. This innovation enables developers to tailor LLMs to specific tasks and industries, enhancing their performance and versatility. By fine-tuning Claude, the team showcased the feasibility of refining open-source LLMs for targeted applications.

articles.title: Custom Policy Enforcement with Reasoning: Faster, Safer AI Applications
articles.summary: Researchers have developed a new approach to custom policy enforcement with reasoning, enabling faster and safer AI applications by allowing for more efficient and effective decision-making. This innovation has the potential to significantly improve the reliability and trustworthiness of AI systems. By integrating reasoning into policy enforcement, AI applications can now make more informed decisions while minimizing risks and errors.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, empowering developers to easily integrate and customize AI models. This update enables seamless interaction with the AI ecosystem, fostering innovation and collaboration. By streamlining model development, Transformers v5 accelerates the creation of more accurate and efficient AI applications.

articles.title: Pebble Index 01 – External memory for your brain
articles.summary: The Pebble Index 01 is a innovative, wearable device designed to serve as an external memory aid, helping users recall important information and tasks. This cutting-edge gadget aims to augment human memory, freeing up mental space and reducing cognitive overload. By providing a personalized, AI-driven memory assistant, the Pebble Index 01 has the potential to revolutionize the way we manage our daily lives and interactions.

articles.title: Kaiju – General purpose 3D/2D game engine in Go and Vulkan with built in editor
articles.summary: Kaiju is a new, open-source game engine written in Go and utilizing Vulkan, offering a general-purpose platform for creating 2D and 3D games. What sets it apart is its built-in editor, making it a self-contained solution for game development. This innovative engine has the potential to simplify game creation and provide a more streamlined experience for developers.

articles.title: LLM from scratch, part 28 – training a base model from scratch on an RTX 3090
articles.summary: A developer has successfully trained a large language model (LLM) from scratch on a single NVIDIA RTX 3090 GPU, demonstrating the feasibility of building complex AI models on consumer-grade hardware. This achievement highlights the rapid advancements in GPU technology and its potential to democratize access to AI research and development. The project showcases the possibility of training LLMs without relying on massive computing clusters or cloud services.

articles.title: Donating the Model Context Protocol and Establishing the Agentic AI Foundation
articles.summary: The Model Context Protocol, a framework for building more transparent and explainable AI models, has been donated to the newly established Agentic AI Foundation. This foundation aims to promote the development of more accountable and trustworthy AI systems, fostering a safer and more beneficial AI ecosystem. By making the protocol open-source, the foundation hopes to accelerate innovation and collaboration in the field of AI transparency and explainability.

articles.title: MCP Joins the Agentic AI Foundation
articles.summary: MCP has joined the Agentic AI Foundation, a non-profit organization focused on developing and promoting decentralized AI technologies. This partnership aims to advance the development of autonomous and decentralized AI systems, enabling more secure and transparent AI applications. By joining the foundation, MCP is contributing to the creation of a more open and community-driven AI ecosystem.

articles.title: Show HN: Detail, a Bug Finder
articles.summary: Detail, a new bug finder tool, has been showcased on Hacker News, offering a novel approach to identifying and debugging issues in code. This innovative tool aims to simplify the debugging process, allowing developers to focus on writing code rather than searching for errors. By leveraging advanced algorithms, Detail promises to increase coding efficiency and reduce the time spent on bug fixing.

articles.title: AWS Trainium3 Deep Dive – A Potential Challenger Approaching
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has unveiled Trainium3, a new custom-designed chip aimed at accelerating machine learning workloads, potentially challenging existing market leaders. Trainium3 boasts improved performance and efficiency, enabling faster and more cost-effective training of large AI models. This innovation could significantly impact the field of artificial intelligence, making it more accessible and affordable for businesses and developers.

articles.title: Apple's slow AI pace becomes a strength as market grows weary of spending
articles.summary: Apple's cautious approach to AI development is now being seen as a strategic advantage, as the market becomes increasingly skeptical of excessive AI spending. This restraint allows Apple to focus on refining its existing AI-powered features, rather than rushing to release new ones. As a result, Apple is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for practical, user-friendly AI applications.
